entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
